title: Honor pls
body:
I got  a chat restriction like 3 months ago for a some unsportsmanlike chatting, but I still after all this time not got back to honor 2. Now if i was **STILL** being toxic I would understand, but that can't be the case if I don't even chat in games. I also get honor most games. Really I just want to know what I can do to raise  honor. (I play at least 10 to 15 games a day)
****
